citation: Spitzer, R. L., Kroenke, K., Williams, J. B. W., & Lowe, B. (2006). A brief measure for assessing generalized anxiety disorder.

items.text: Feeling nervous, anxious, or on edge
items.factor: Feeling Nervous, Anxious, or On Edge

items.text: Not being able to stop or control worrying
items.factor: Not Being Able to Stop or Control Worrying

items.text: Worrying too much about different things
items.factor: Worrying Too Much About Different Things

items.text: Being so restless that it is hard to sit still
items.factor: Being So Restless That It’s Hard to Sit Still

items.text: Feeling afraid, as if something awful might happen
items.factor: Feeling Afraid as if Something Awful Might Happen
